statements: UPDATE consensus_voting_mechanisms SET algorithm = 'BFT' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE consensus_voting_mechanisms SET votes = 10 WHERE algorithm = 'POW';
UPDATE consensus_voting_mechanisms SET algorithm = 'DPoS', votes = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE consensus_voting_mechanisms SET votes = 150, algorithm = 'PoA' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Consensus_Algorithms SET description='Used in blockchain technology' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Voting_Mechanisms SET purpose='Decision making process' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE Consensus_Algorithms SET description = 'Proof of Work algorithm' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Voting_Mechanisms SET purpose = 'To elect new representatives' WHERE mechanism_name = 'Blockchain Voting'
UPDATE consensus_algorithms SET description = 'A consensus algorithm that uses a proof-of-work mechanism' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_network SET network_name = 'Ethereum Network', consensus_id = 2, voting_id = 1 WHERE network_id = 3;

UPDATE consensus_algorithms SET description = 'Proof-of-Work is a consensus algorithm that requires participants to perform a certain amount of computational work to gain the right to add a new block to the blockchain.' WHERE algorithm_name = 'Proof-of-Work';
UPDATE blockchain_network SET voting_id = (SELECT id FROM voting_mechanisms WHERE mechanism_name = 'Delegated Proof of Stake') WHERE network_name = 'EOS Network';
UPDATE consensus_algorithms SET version = 2.1 WHERE algorithm_name = 'PoA';
UPDATE voting_mechanisms SET quorum = 51 WHERE mechanism_name = 'DPoS';
UPDATE voting_mechanisms SET quorum = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE consensus_algorithms SET description = 'Updated description', algorithm_name = 'New Algorithm' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE consensus_algorithm SET description='Updated description for algorithm 1' WHERE algorithm_id=1;
UPDATE voting_member SET is_active=true, member_address='New Address' WHERE member_id=3;
UPDATE vote SET vote_decision = 'approve' WHERE vote_id = 1;
UPDATE voting_member SET member_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE member_id = 2;
